Tile.description: The hard glass floors and clear walls reflect and refract light in a varying array of shifting patterns, occasionally with the faintest unnatural glow of subtle purple. Almost difficult to see at first amongst the shimmering surfaces, a glass display case stands in the center of the room.

Entryway.basic__description: A beautifully adorned glass door NORTH
Entryway.feel: The coolness of the air in the tower is refreshing and surprising after the acrid heat of the desert.

Item.name: box
Item.full__description: A small wooden box with a hinged side
Item.feel: It feels smooth, a light layer of dust covers it. Clearly it has not been opened in a long time

Item.name: mechanism
Item.full__description: A large silver globe mounted on a metal post juts from a complicated metal stand

Item.name: stand
Item.full__description: you find a flat round plate that appears to be bolted to the top beneath the rod. Upon further inspection you also find a small square hole in the side of the stand.

Item.name: hole
Item.full__description: A small square hole that seems to lead to the internal engine of the mechanism

Item.name: plate
Item.full__description: a flat round plate that appears to be bolted to the top beneath the rod

MovableItem.name: handle
MovableItem.full__description: a small metal handle with a square shaped peg on the end
MovableItem.feel: It feels cool in your hands.

MovableItem.name: crystal
MovableItem.full__description: The faucets glitter as the stone splits even the faintest light into a dozen little stars.
MovableItem.feel: It appears to be made from the same material as the glass tower, but more densely formed.

Tile.description: You walk in the dark, cold room. High walls made of stone.

Item.name: ceiling
Item.basic__description: A round stained glass dome, finely set with glass of muted copper, gold, silver and blue.
Item.full__description: The curling colours flow in an ornate circle to form a compass adorned with elemental symbols. At North there is curls of wind, At West a a red ball of flame, East with purple swirls of magic and South brown shards of stone. The glass is dark and no light can be seen shining through it.

Item.name: desk
Item.basic__description: The desk is heavyset, made with thick marble slabs and inlayed with delicate carvings.
Item.full__description: The desk has several hefty looking drawers made from the same stone. The surface of the desk has four carved indentations with a tarnished copper compass mounted in the middle.

Item.name: drawers
Item.full__description: you struggle and after several seconds the impractical marble drawers grind open, to reveal several small stone tiles.

MovableItem.name: Stone Tiles
MovableItem.full__description: The tiles fit comfortably in your palm, carved with images of 4 creatures; a gryphon, a golem, a unicorn and a dragon, all ferociously posed.

Item.name: bones
Item.full__description: You find a note amongst the remains.

MovableItem.name: note
MovableItem.full__description: In scrawling ancient hand it reads 'In our search of reason, we have lost true meaning- the magi and I have been searching so long, so listlessly to find the fundamentals of what gives magic to this universe that I believe we have lost sight of magic itself. The preparations are nearly complete. Soon we shall know if the answers we chase are as imaginary as the beasts of legends themselves’ On the opposite side of the note a series of numbers have been hastily recorded with once dripping ink: [NUMBER PUZZLE ANSWER]

Tile.description: You are standing in glittering soft sands the color of tarnished copper. Distant dunes ripple softly with the listless breeze, ever transforming under the heavy heat of the sun. To the North there is an iridescent glass tower, to the West a stoic grey stone tower, to the East a jet obsidian tower. They stand immense, appearing to concave upwards as they stretch towards the sun. What do you do?

MovableItem.name: hourglass
MovableItem.basic__description: Small hour glass lies nestled in sand in front of you.
MovableItem.full__description: you gently pluck a small hourglass from the ground. It is delicately carved from what appears to be a white stone, curling spirals twist around the central glass. Upon holding it upright the black sands it contains begin flowing gently upwards as if counting time in inverse. It feels cool in your hands.

Tile.description: The room is pitch, as if the walls surrounding you consume the light from the outside with an otherworldly hunger. A stillness follows your hollow scraping footsteps on the coarse black shale floor. The room contains a crude basin emanating the only source of haunting red light, by which you can make out an adjacent table height slab with a small deck of cards placed on it.

Entryway.basic__description: a spined black stone door, intimidating and dark WEST
Entryway.feel: the door is sharp enough to almost draw blood

Item.name: basin
Item.full__description: Rising slightly higher than your waist, the hewn obsidian basin appears to be filled equally with two liquids; rippling red molten and clear blue water. The two liquids are separated down the center by two thick marble disks.
Item.feel: hard and coarse, painful to the touch

Item.name: disks
Item.full__description: the disks are carved deeply with recognizable numerals, and appear to be spinnable.
Item.feel: they feel hauntingly warm, as if alive

Item.name: slab
Item.full__description: engraved subtly on the ebony stone an inscription reads 'skill of the shuffle, luck of the draw'
Item.feel: it is engraved on the tables smooth surface

MovableItem.name: deck
MovableItem.basic__description: a deck of shabby divination cards
MovableItem.full__description: a deck of divination cards, the shabby black backs imply heavy use by their previous owner. Upon a closer inspection you find they are black on both sides.

MovableItem.name: 7 of swords
MovableItem.full__description: a man stands struggling to carry 5 swords, while looking wistfully behind him at two remaining swords stick out of the ground.

MovableItem.name: 7 of coins
MovableItem.full__description: the card portrays a young man taking a rest from the difficult work of harvesting his abundant crop. 7 lush flowers surround him

MovableItem.name: Key
MovableItem.full__description: The key seems to absorb all light around it except for eerily glowing scripture emblazoned in red on its handle: 'seventh son of magic, seventh son of time'
